alert.note: Alert for Erie; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:44PM EDT until July 13 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Erie County in north central Ohio... Northern Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 344 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Western Vermilion to Vermilion to 6 miles north of Wakeman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lorain, Elyria, Western Vermilion, Vermilion, Westlake, North Ridgeville, Avon Lake, Amherst, Grafton, Avon, Bay Village, Sheffield Lake, Eaton, Oberlin, Sheffield, South Amherst, Berlin Heights, Birmingham and Eaton Estates. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
